plain: The user's favourite genre is likely to be fantasy, as several of the books listed fall into that category. The user's favourite kind of plot is likely to be character-driven, as many of the books listed focus on the development of the protagonist over the course of the story. The user's favourite setting is likely to be a fictional world, as many of the books listed take place in alternate realities. The user's favourite writing style is likely to be descriptive, as many of the books listed are known for their vivid prose. The user's favourite length is likely to be novel-length, as most of the books listed are full-length novels. The user's favourite topic is likely to be mythology, as several of the books listed draw heavily from ancient myths and legends. The user's favourite pacing is likely to be slow and steady, as many of the books listed are known for their deliberate pacing. The user's favourite narrative structure is likely to be third-person omniscient, as many of the books listed are written from this perspective. The user's favourite themes are likely to be identity, self-discovery, and the power of imagination.
